column3: Set default device using, ${CMD}wpctl set-default <${INT}number${CMD}>. ${CMT}Source = Microphone and Sink = Sound.

column1: '[tlp] Disable Conservation Mode - Set to fullcharge temporarily'
column3: 'You can set default charging mode at: /etc/tlp.conf'

column1: '[tlp] Enable Conservation Mode - Set charging limit @60%'
